person.persName: Louis B. Bates (Jefferson County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Son of H. G. Bates. Married to Sarah “Sally” Claxon Bates in Owen County on October 20, 1836. Father of John Bates, H. Gurella Bates, Nancy Bates, and Mahaly E. Bates. Physician in Louisville in 1860. Physician in Louisville in 1861.
